{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$54.1K in 2021-2022** on contracts with MICHANIE CONSTRUCTION.

Across 34 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 9 have at least one amendment (26%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 70% and the average number of amendments was 2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$3.5M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.61 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$353.9K. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$8.7M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
